channel.title: Politics

item.title: Dan Bongino officially leaves FBI deputy director role after less than a year, returns to 'civilian life'
item.description: Dan Bongino returned to private life on Sunday, stepping down from his FBI deputy director role after less than a year on the job.

item.title: The Fall of Maduro: Why It Matters to United States Security, and Could Trigger a South American Glasnost
Kamala Harris blasts Trump administration’s capture of Venezuela’s Maduro as ‘unlawful and unwise’
item.description: Kamala Harris condemns Trump's capture of Venezuelan dictator Maduro as "unlawful and unwise," warning of potential chaos and questioning oil motives.

item.title: Ukraine Tricks Russia Into Paying $500K Bounty
item.description: A pro-Ukrainian Russian group teamed with Kyiv's military intelligence to trick Moscow authorities into paying their enemies a $500,000 bounty.
